snippet: Former President Bill Clinton quashed suggestions that his praise of Mitt Romney’s business career amounted to an endorsement.
abstract: Former Pres Bill Clinton announces his support for Pres Obama during their joint appearance at three fund-raisers in New York City; comments seek to quash suggestions that Clinton's earlier praise of Mitt Romney's business career had amounted to an off-message endorsement of the Republican presidential nominee.
lead_paragraph: Former President Bill Clinton quashed suggestions that his praise of Mitt Romney’s business career amounted to an endorsement.

headline.seo: Clinton Stands by Obama at New York Fund-Raisers
headline.main: Clinton Supports Obama at New York Fund-Raisers
headline.print_headline: Clinton Supports Obama at New York Fund-Raisers
